_UserAccountSettingsTwoFactorSetupModalI: You will need to install a two-factor authentication application on your mobile device to continue. We recommend using Google Authenticator.
Please first scan the QR code using the mobile application.
Once set up, you will be asked for a code each time you log in.
Now enter the six-digit code from the two-factor mobile application to complete the set up.

_brandingDoYouWantToDeleteTheme: If you delete the theme the Default theme will be used instead.
_brandingThemesActionColorSample: Action buttons, arrows, mandatory actions and elements that require attention. We recommend your primary brand colour or a colour that stands out.
_brandingThemesActionSecondaryColorSampl: Optional actions and links. We recommend a lighter colour, one that compliments your primary action colour.
_brandingThemesBrandColorSample: The colour that will appear on larger areas such as the background of the headers. This colour will also be the background behind your logo.
_brandingThemesFontSample: This font will be used wherever possible.
_brandingThemesNegativeColorSample: This colour will appear on notifications such as \\"Error\\". We recommend an intuitively negative colour such as red.
_brandingThemesPositiveColorSample: This colour will appear on notification such as \\"Saved\\" and \\"Success\\". We recommend an intuitively positive colour like green.

_changeEmailAndMobileModalLabel: Change the email address and mobile number and send the invitations again. The previous invitations to this party will be withdrawn and the sign links invalidated. New invitations and sign links will be sent to both the email address and the mobile number of this party, even if only one of them is updated.
_changeEmailModalAcceptInvalidEmailFlash: The email address is incorrectly formatted. Correct format is example@email.com
_changeEmailModalLabel: Change the email address and send the invitation again. The previous invitation to this party will be withdrawn and the sign link invalidated. A new invitation and sign link will be sent to the new email address of this party.
_changeEmailRequestExplanation: Your email and username are the same in Scrive. By changing the email you will also change the username for logging in. To verify your new address we will send you a confirmation email. Please follow the instructions in the email to complete the change.
_changeMobileModalAcceptInvalidMobileFla: The mobile number is incorrectly formatted. Correct format is +46123456789
_changeMobileModalLabel: Change the mobile number and send the invitation again. The previous invitation to this party will be withdrawn and the sign link invalidated. A new invitation and sign link will be sent to the new mobile number of this party.
_confirmAccountMaybeCreatedUser: Check your email for an activation link. If you have an account, try to reset your password instead.
_confirmationMailUndeliveredContentBody: Unfortunately the confirmation for the document $documenttitle$ could not be delivered to $name$ <$email$>. This may be because the recipient's mail server is experiencing difficulties, or because the email address you have provided is incorrect.
_contractcancelmodaltext:
If a party clicks on the signing link after you have withdrawn the invitation, they will be informed that it is no longer possible to sign.
No additional message will be sent.
Are you sure you want to withdraw this invitation?
_contractcancelmodaltextwithsignatures:
Withdrawing this invitation will render all signatures invalid.
Additionally, if a party clicks on the signing link after you have withdrawn the invitation, they will be informed that it is no longer possible to sign.
No additional message will be sent.
Are you sure you want to withdraw this invitation?
_csvFilePersons: one person for each row defined in the CSV file
_dataRetentionCanceledDescription: Moves withdrawn documents to trash after chosen number of days after cancellation.
_dataRetentionCanceledText: Trash withdrawn documents after <span class='put-field'/> days
_dataRetentionClosedDescription: Moves signed documents to trash after chosen number of days after document was signed by all parties.
_dataRetentionClosedText: Trash signed documents after <span class='put-field'/> days
_dataRetentionCompanyMaximum: (maximum <span class='put-max-days'/> days as per company policy)
_dataRetentionErrorDescription: Moves documents with error to trash after chosen number days after the error occured.
_dataRetentionErrorText: Trash documents with error after <span class='put-field'/> days
_dataRetentionImmediateTrashDescription: Deletes all documents in trash within 24 hours.
_dataRetentionPreparationDescription: Moves drafts to trash after chosen number of days after last edit and save.
_dataRetentionRejectedDescription: Moves rejected documents to trash after chosen number of days after rejection.
_dataRetentionRejectedText: Trash rejected documents after <span class='put-field'/> days
_dataRetentionSideBarParagraph1: The settings on this page can be used to set data retention rules for your documents. Trashing a document means that it gets moved to the trash section of the e-archive. Anything in the trash will normally be permanently deleted 30 days after being placed in the trash. You can override this here and have trashed documents deleted sooner. Once a document has been deleted from the trash, it will be permanently gone. So please use these options carefully.
_dataRetentionSideBarParagraph2: Updates to these settings will become effective within 24 hours.
_dataRetentionSideBarParagraph3: If a person who has signed one of your documents also has a Scrive account of their own, their copy of the document will not be deleted even if yours is.
_dataRetentionSideBarParagraph4: It is possible to set a global retention policy for your organisation. Users or admins in your organisation can then only specify stricter rules (shorter retention period) than the company policy. Please contact Scrive to have this configured for your organisation.
_dataRetentionSuccessMessage: The data retention policy has been successfully saved.
_dataRetentionTimedoutDescription: Moves timed out documents to trash after chosen number of days after due date passed.
_dataRetentionTimedoutText: Trash timed out documents after <span class='put-field'/> days

_designviewCantSignModalInfo2: Go to \\"Add parties\\" and check if one or more parties are highlighted. Click on this party and look for highlighted fields.
_designviewCantSignModalLi1: Check if the email address (if any) is entered correctly. It shouldn’t contain any spaces. This is the format: example@email.com
_designviewCantSignModalLi2: The mobile number (if any) must include a \\"+\\" together with the country code. The leading \\"0\\" should be removed. This is the format: +46701234567
_designviewCantSignModalLi3: Check that all text fields that are mandatory for sender have been filled.
_designviewCantSignModalLi4: Make sure that all checkboxes that are mandatory for sender have been pre-checked.

_flashWrongCity: City must contain at most 60 characters
_flashWrongCompanyAddress: Company address must contain only (up to 100) letters, numbers, spaces, apostrophes, brackets, colons, commas, full-stops, hashes and hyphens
_flashWrongCompanyName: Company name code must contain at most 100 characters
_flashWrongCompanyNumber: Company number must contain only 4-50 letters, numbers, spaces or hyphens
_flashWrongCountry: Country must contain at most 60 characters
_flashWrongName: Name may contain only letters, digits, hyphens and spaces (up to 100 characters)
_flashWrongPersonalNumber: Personal number must contain 10 or 12 digits (hyphens and spaces will be stripped)
_flashWrongPhone: Phone number must start with + and contain only digits (at least 9). Spaces, brackets and hyphens will be stripped
_flashWrongPosition: Position field must contain at most 100 letters, numbers, spaces, apostrophes, hyphens, ampersands, brackets, colons and commas
_flashWrongZip: Zip code must contain at most 20 characters

Something went wrong

_invalidAttachments: Sorry, this file format is not supported. Please select a PDF file instead.
_invitationMailDeferredContentBodyFirst: Unfortunately we are experiencing difficulties delivering the invitation to e-sign to $counterpartname$ <$counterpartemail$>. Either their email address is incorrect or their email server is experiencing issues.
_invitationMailDeferredContentBodySecond: Please note, we will continue attempting to deliver the email and will notify you of the progress. Click the button below if you wish to cancel the process or change the address.
_invitationMailDeliveredAfterDeferredCon: We notified you in an earlier email that we were having difficulties delivering an email. After subsequent attempts we have successfully delivered the invitation to $email$ to e-sign the document $documenttitle$.
_invitationMailUndeliveredContentBody: Unfortunately the invitation to e-sign the document $documenttitle$ could not be delivered to $name$ <$email$>. This may be because the recipient's mail server is experiencing difficulties, or because the email address you have provided is incorrect.
_invitationMailUndeliveredContentBodyApp: Unfortunately the invitation to approve the document $documenttitle$ could not be delivered to $name$ <$email$>. This may be because the recipient's mail server is experiencing difficulties, or because the email address you have provided is incorrect.
_invitationMailUndeliveredContentBodyFir: To confirm the email address and resend the invitation:
_invitationMailUndeliveredContentBodyVie: Unfortunately the invitation to view the document $documenttitle$ could not be delivered to $name$ <$email$>. This may be because the recipient's mail server is experiencing difficulties, or because the email address you have provided is incorrect.
_invitationMailUndeliveredContentInstruc: Confirm the email address and send again
Access the document from your e-archive or by clicking the button below
_invitationSMSUndeliveredContentBody: We have not been able to deliver the invitation to e-sign the document $documenttitle$ to $name$ ($mobile$). This may be because the mobile number you have provided is incorrect.
_invitationSMSUndeliveredContentBodyFirs: To correct the mobile number and resend the invitation:
_invitationSMSUndeliveredContentInstruct: Confirm the mobile number and send again
Access the document from your e-archive or by clicking the button below

_mailDocumentAwaitingForAuthorContentRea: The document $documenttitle$ is ready to sign.
_mailDocumentAwaitingForAuthorContentSig: You set yourself to e-sign the document $documenttitle$ after $partylistSigned:noescape()$ had signed. It is now your turn.
_mailDocumentAwaitingForAuthorFurtherIns: Click the button for further instructions.
_mailDocumentErrorContentBodyFirst: Unfortunately Scrive E-sign could not handle the document file $documenttitle$. Therefore the signing process has been cancelled.
_mailDocumentErrorContentBodySecond: If you have any comments or questions regarding this issue, please contact Scrive support at $supportmaillink()$.
_mailDocumentPartyProcessFinalizedWithCo: When all parties have signed or approved you will get a confirmation message.
_mailDocumentSignedNotificationContent: You have now signed the document $documenttitle$.
_mailForwardMailContent1: $creatorname$ has requested we send the document $documenttitle$ to you. It was signed through Scrive E-sign.
_mailForwardSigningForAuthorButton: Click the button to view the document.
_mailForwardSigningForAuthorContent: $fromName$ has forwarded the document $documenttitle$ to $toName$ to e-sign.
_mailForwardSigningForAuthorContentAppro: $fromName$ has forwarded the document $documenttitle$ to $toName$ to approve.
_mailForwardSigningForNewSignatoryButton: Click the button for further instructions.
_mailForwardSigningForNewSignatoryDescri: $fromName$ has forwarded the document $documenttitle$ for you to e-sign.
$fromName$ has forwarded the document $documenttitle$ for you to approve.
_mailNewAccountCreatedByAdminContentBody: Please click the button below to activate your account.
_mailNewAccountCreatedByAdminContentHead: $creatorname$ has created an account for you at Scrive.

Scrive is a service that allows you to e-sign documents online instead of fumbling with paper, pen, scanner and fax-machines. It's legally binding, secure and simple for all parties involved. Activate your account and you can start signing right away. Your counterparts are not required to have Scrive to receive and sign documents sent using Scrive.
_mailNewCompanyUserInviteContentClickLin: Please click the button below to activate your account. This invitation is valid until $expiredate$.
_mailNewCompanyUserInvitePrivacyInfo: This account is intended to be used only in relation to $companyname$ and all saved documents will belong to $companyname$. This account is not for private use.
_mailRequestChangeEmailByAdminExplanatio: $requestedby$ has requested your Scrive username and email to be changed to $newemail$. To complete this change, click the button below.
_mailRequestChangeEmailExplanation: You have requested that your Scrive username and email be changed to $newemail$. To complete this change, click the button below.
_mailTakeoverPrivateUserInviteContentBod: $invitername$ has invited you to convert your private Scrive account into a company account with $companyname$. If you accept this invitation, your account and documents will be owned by $companyname$.
You should not have any private documents in your account when accepting, so please follow the steps below before accepting this request:
_mailTakeoverPrivateUserInviteContentIns:
• Check your Scrive e-archive for private or personal documents
  • Download and save these documents and then remove them from your e-archive
  • Then press the button below
  • Follow the instructions online
Ensure you have completed steps 1 and 2 above, before pressing the button below.
_mailTimedoutInstructionDescription: The due date to sign $documenttitle$ has passed. To prolong the due date, open the document in the e-archive and click "Extend due date".
_mailTimedoutInstructionStep1: Access the document from your e-archive or by clicking the button below
_mailTimedoutInstructionStep3: Enter desired number of days to prolong the due date and click "Extend"
_mailTimedoutInstructionStep4: Please note: No notification of the new due date will be sent to the signing parties. To notify a signatory use the manual reminder function.

_modalAddCompanyAccountBody: Invite someone new or ask an existing Scrive user to join your company.
_modalDoYouWantToBeCompanyAccountBody: Do you want to convert your private Scrive account into a $companyname$ Scrive account? When you convert, the ownership of the account and all its documents, will be transferred to $companyname$.

If you have received this in error please notify the sender and delete immediately.
_selectFilesYouWantToUpload: Select the files you would like to upload
_sessionTimeOutContent1: You can access this document again by following the invitation link you got.
_sessionTimeOutContent2: Most receive this link via email or SMS.
_signviewSettingsTitle: Customize how the signing page will look like
_smsClosedNotification: The document $documenttitle$ has been signed. Find the document by following this link: $link$ It will be available to download until $availabledate$.
_smsClosedNotificationWithEmail: The document $documenttitle$ has been signed. Find the document by following this link: $link$ We have also sent the signed document to your email. It will be available to download until $availabledate$.
_smsCorrectedNotification: We noticed that we previously sent you a document that was incorrect in that it lacked a digital signature, but we have now corrected this error. Find the document with proper digital signature by following this link: $link$
_smsCorrectedNotificationWithEmail: We noticed that we previously sent you a document that was incorrect in that it lacked a digital signature, but we have now corrected this error. Find the document with proper digital signature by following this link: $link$ We have also sent the corrected document to your email.
_smsDocumentApprovedNotification: You have now approved the document $documenttitle$. To view the document, follow this link: $link$
_smsDocumentSignedNotification: You have now signed the document $documenttitle$. To view the document, follow this link: $link$ It will be available to download until $availabledate$.
_smsForwardSigningForAuthor: $fromName$ has forwarded the document $documenttitle$ to $toName$ to e-sign. Follow the link to view the document $authorlink$
_smsForwardSigningForAuthorApproving: $fromName$ has forwarded the document $documenttitle$ to $toName$ to approve. Follow the link to view the document $authorlink$
_smsForwardSigningForNewSignatory: $fromName$ has forwarded the document $documenttitle$ for you to e-sign. Follow the link for further instructions $link$
_smsForwardSigningForNewSignatoryApprovi: $fromName$ has forwarded the document $documenttitle$ for you to approve. Follow the link for further instructions $link$
_smsInvitationToAuthor: It is your turn to sign the document $documenttitle$. Follow the link for further instructions $link$
_tbsYouSignWithEleg: I sign the document "$document_title$" with transaction number $document_id$.
_templatesShareableLinkDiscardText: Do you really want to discard this shareable link? When someone uses a discarded link, an error message will be displayed.
_templatesShareableLinkDiscardingFailed: Unfortunately, an error occured when discarding the shareable link.
_templatesShareableLinkDiscardingSucceed: The shareable link has been discarded successfully.
_templatesShareableLinkGenerateText: Do you really want to generate a shareable link for this template?
_templatesShareableLinkGenerationFailed: Unfortunately, an error occured when generating the new shareable link.
_templatesShareableLinkGenerationSucceed: The new shareable link has been generated successfully.
_templatesShareableLinkRegenerateText: Do you really want to regenerate this shareable link?  When someone uses the previous link, an error message will be displayed.
_templatesShareableLinkShowText: Every time some person accesses this link, a document will be created based on this template. The person will then be redirected to signing page for the first non-author signatory.
_tooLargeAttachment: The file exceeds the maximum size of 10 MB. Try to make it smaller.
_trashSubheadline24Hours: Documents in the trash will be automatically deleted within 24 hours due to the data retention policy in place. See the account section for more details.
_trashSubheadline30Days: Documents that have been in the trash for more than 30 days will be automatically deleted.
_unsupportedBrowserHeader: We don't support the version of the browser you are using:
_unsupportedBrowserInstruction1: Update your browser to a newer version of Internet Explorer.
_unsupportedBrowserInstruction2: Open the link in a different browser (e.g. Chrome or Firefox).
_unsupportedBrowserInstructionsHeader: To continue, please do one of the following:
_userDeleted: Your account has been deleted successfully.
_userDeletionModalMessageLine1: This will delete your Scrive account.
_userDeletionModalMessageLine2: All the documents in your e-archive will also be deleted. Documents that exist in other users' e-archives will be retained by them.
_userDeletionModalMessageLine4: Please type the email address used for this account () to confirm deletion.
_userNotDeletableDueToPendingDocumentsLi: Please check your e-archive as you have pending documents. To delete your user account you can't have pending documents.
The documents must be either signed, rejected, withdrawn or timed out before your account can be deleted.
_verificationDescription: By uploading a document here you can check the authenticity of the document to make sure it hasn’t been compromised.
_verificationErrorMessage: An error occured while trying to verify the document's authenticity. Please try again.
_verificationFailedMessage: This document has not been signed using Scrive or the original has been altered by someone.
_verificationPageDescription: This verification was issued by Scrive. Information in italics has been safely verified by Scrive. For more information/evidence about this document see the concealed attachments. Use a PDF-reader such as Adobe Reader that can show concealed attachments to view the attachments. Please observe that if the document is printed, the originality of such printed copy cannot be verified as per the below and that a basic print-out lacks the contents of the concealed attachments. The digital signature (electronic seal) ensures that the originality of this document, including the concealed attachments, can be proven mathematically and independently of Scrive. For your convenience Scrive also provides a service that enables you to automatically verify the document's originality at: $verifyurl$
_youCantCancelThisDocuments: Some of the selected documents can't be withdrawn.
_youCantSendRemindersToThisDocuments: Reminders can’t be sent for some of the selected documents.
